title: The day of salvation, or, A homily upon the bloody sacrifice of Christ, or his death and passion written, and intended onely for private meditation of a most noble and vertuous lady, on Good-Friday last, but since thought worthy the publique view / by Anthony Stafford ...
author: Stafford, Anthony.
publicationStmtPublisher: By N. and I. Okes, for Daniel Frere at the Red Bull in Little Brittaine,
